author: Mark Murray
title: Sanders' campaign ends without expanding his 2016 base
description: When Bernie Sanders ended his presidential campaign on Wednesday, it appears his downfall was his failure to expand his base from 2016.
content:
Sanders' campaign ends without expanding his 2016 base
WASHINGTON As Vermont Independent Sen. Bernie Sanders suspended his presidential campaign Wednesday his ultimate downfall was that he never expanded beyond his progressive base.
In fact, he ended up und… [+29872 chars]
